an10.134:4.1: “Mendicants, I will teach you what is good and what is not good.
an10.134:4.2: Listen and pay close attention, I will speak.”
an10.134:5.2: Wrong view, wrong motivation, wrong speech, wrong action, wrong livelihood, wrong mindfulness, wrong samādhi, wrong knowledge, and wrong freedom.
an10.134:5.3: This is called what is not good.
an10.134:5.5: Right view, right motivation, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right mindfulness, right samādhi, right knowledge, and right freedom.
an10.134:5.6: This is called what is good.”
